DefaultEvent.Name: You steer close, shining the lamp on the debris

ChildBranches.Name: Investigate the wreckage
ChildBranches.Description: You will have to be quick to salvage anything.

DefaultEvent.Description: The crew manages to scoop up a few crates before the sinking ship loses its struggle with inevitability. What's this?
DefaultEvent.Name: A fishing expedition

ChildBranches.Name: Investigate the wreckage
ChildBranches.Description: The Pirate-Poet made this class popular with corsairs and smugglers. A pity so little remains to plunder.

DefaultEvent.Description: The prow-light catches the Pirate-Poet desperately clutching a few buoyant bits of debris. The Modiste's smile flickers. "A pity, almost. Ho hum."
DefaultEvent.Name: A survivor!

ChildBranches.Name: Search for the Pirate-Poet
ChildBranches.Description: The Merciless Modiste looks out at the wreckage, unconcerned. "Oh, it'll take more than that to sink her. Come on, my dear. I know you're there."

DefaultEvent.Description: Its cargo is lost. Any survivors are on their own.
DefaultEvent.Name: The ship sinks beneath the glass

ChildBranches.Name: Leave the wreckage
ChildBranches.Description: The battle is over. You're done here.

DefaultEvent.Description: Its cargo is lost. Any survivors are on their own.
DefaultEvent.Name: The ship sinks beneath the glass

ChildBranches.Name: Leave the wreckage
ChildBranches.Description: The battle is over. You're done here.

Description: Crippled, broken, already feeding the zee's endless hunger. Little remains of the ship but scraps of sinking cargo and a few buoyant parts of its splintered carcass.
Name: You've defeated an Alcaeus-class vessel
